member.summary: Points, 72 per inch.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleMode.Pixels
member.summary: Pixels, normaelly 96 per inch.

member.summary: Centimetres, 2.54 per inch.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleMode.Inches
member.summary: Inch

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleMode.Millimetres
member.summary: Millimetres, 25.4 per inch.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleMode.Mils
member.summary: Mils, 1000 per inch.

member.name: T:RulerControl.ScaleAlignment
member.summary: Alignment of the ruler scale markings.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleAlignment.TopOrLeft
member.summary: Top on horizontal ruler or left on a verticle ruler.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleAlignment.Middle
member.summary: Centred on horizonal and vertical rulers.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleAlignment.BottomOrRight
member.summary: Bottom on horizontal ruler or right on a verticle ruler.

member.name: T:RulerControl.ScaleDirection
member.summary: Direction the rule scale is rendered.

member.summary: Left to right on a horizonal ruler and top to bottom on a verticle ruler.

member.name: F:RulerControl.ScaleDirection.RightToLeft
member.summary: Right to left on a horizonal ruler and bottom to top on a verticle ruler.

member.summary: Occurs when the scale mode has changed.

member.summary: Occurs when the hover value has changed.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.BorderStyle
member.summary: Boarder type to use when rendering the ruler.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.Orientation
member.summary: Decides if the ruler layout is horizonal or vertical.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.ScaleDirection
member.summary: The direction the scale will be drawn on the ruler.
member.remarks: Left to right will draw the scale top to bottom when the orientation is set to vertical and right to left will draw the scale bottom to top when the orientation is vertical.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.StartValue
member.summary: A value in scale units from which to start drawing the ruler marks.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.ScaleMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the ruler scale units.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.MajorInterval
member.summary: The value of the major interval.
member.remarks: When displaying inches, 1 is a typical value. When displaying Points, 36 or 72 might good values.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.Divisions
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of divisions between each major interval.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.DivisionMarkFactor
member.summary: A value used to calculate the size of the division markers.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.MiddleMarkFactor
member.summary: A value used to calculate the size of the middle markers.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.ScaleValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the current mouse position expressed in unit of the scale set.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.MouseTrackingOn
member.summary: Determines if an indicator is displayed to track the current position of the mouse.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.Font
member.summary: Get or set the font to use for the division number.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.TrackLineColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the color of the track marker.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.TrackLineStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of track marker.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.ForeColor
member.summary: Gets or set the ruler fore ground color.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.BackColor
member.summary: Gets or sets the ruler back ground color.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.VerticalNumbers
member.summary: Gets or sets the orientation of the rule text.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.ZoomFactor
member.summary: Gets or sets the zoom value of the ruler scale.

member.name: P:RulerControl.Ruler.RulerAlignment
member.summary: Gets or sets the positioning of the ruler markings.
